item.title: Talk: Simplicity matters
item.description: I’ve seen this video by Rich Hickey: “Simplicity matters”, taken from Manuel Rivero’s google plus' site here are my notes: the software is the elephant do more, do it differently, do it better complexity of the elephant is going to dominate what you can do your ability to reason about your program is critical design is about pulling things apart become familiar by learning, trying “We can be creating the exact same programs out of significantly simpler components”.
